feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
